biotools.summary: A molecular-class information system that collects, combines, validates and stores large amounts of data on Nuclear Hormone Receptors (NHRs). Contains data on sequences, ligand binding constants and mutations. In addition, many different types of computationally derived data are stored such as multiple sequence alignments and homology models.

bioschemas.name: NucleaRDB
